author: Tim Daniels
title: NYC Mayor Bill De Blasio Has Park Basketball Hoops Removed During Quarantine
description: New York City mayor Bill de Blasio said Wednesday the city will remove basketball hoops at parks where pick-up games continued despite social-distancing guidelines as a result of the coronavirus pandemic...
content:
Mary Altaffer/Associated Press
New York City mayor Bill de Blasio said Wednesday the city will remove basketball hoops at parks where pick-up games continued despite social-distancing guidelines as a result of the coronavirus pandemic. 
"There will not be a… [+1310 chars]
